stance_1: Chicken is the cheapest meat option
justification: The interviewee explicitly states that chicken is cheap and eaten most meals, supporting daily meat consumption.

stance_1: Chicken is the cheapest meat option

justification: The economic factor of chicken being cheap is linked to family meals, supporting the stance of family eating a lot of meat.

stance_1: Chicken is the cheapest meat option

stance_2: I live with family who eat a lot of meat
